summary: Ever hate your choices of starting gear?
descriptionHtml:
Ever hate your choices of starting gear?

I did, Imperial and stormcloak stuff just wasnt my thing, even a second of wearing thier armors drove me mad. I wanted to fight through enemies with a bow, and nice heavy armor.

Seeing as how easily you can make things with the creation kit, I simply added some starting gear choices to the chest you get your armor from (imperial side).

It adds a few things you can get, but later, such as potions, a mace, a longbow, arrows. However, It also adds iron armor taken from a prisoner (but they lost his helmet somewhere in the caves...), and items for a mage.

Soon I will have a vendor that sells class related items, like bows, near riverwood, to replace this.

Enjoy,

-Aaron :)


Note: Please Post suggestions and comments, as soon as I get a better computer I will be trying to make a lot of mods. -Aaron
author: Aaron
